/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street bathed in the warmth of a sunny day. The trees, lush and green, stand tall on both sides of the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered here and there, adding depth to the vast expanse. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and continuity. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions. The relative positions of the objects remain constant, with the trees lining the street and the sky forming the backdrop. The image is a snapshot of a peaceful moment, frozen in time.
